total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the rows that are filled with 5s and 0s in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the rows that are filled with only 0s in the input grid.
Q3: Replace the 0s that are between 5s in the rows identified in Q1 with 2s.
Q4: Replace the 0s in the rows identified in Q2 with 1s, but only if they are between two rows filled with 2s from Q3.
Q5: Replace the remaining 0s in the rows identified in Q2 with 2s, if they are between two 2s in the same row.
Q6: Generate the output grid using the modifications from Q3, Q4, and Q5.

Q2: Identify the rows that are filled with only 0s in the input grid.
Q3: Replace the 0s that are between 5s in the rows identified in Q1 with 2s.

Q5: Replace the remaining 0s in the rows identified in Q2 with 2s, if they are between two 2s in the same row.
Q6: Generate the output grid using the modifications from Q3, Q4, and Q5.
Q1: Identify the rows that are filled with 5s and 0s in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the rows that are filled with only 0s in the input grid.
Q3: Replace the 0s that are between 5s in the rows identified in Q1 with 2s.
Q4: Replace the 0s in the rows identified in Q2 with 1s, except for the first and last 0s.
Q5: Replace the 0s that are between 2s in the rows identified in Q1 with 2s.
Q6: Replace the 0s that are between 1s in the rows identified in Q2 with 2s.
